Name: Average time from Declaration SUBMITTED by EMPLOYEE to Declaration REJECTED by PRE_APPROVER
Metric: The average of the duration between activity 'Declaration SUBMITTED by EMPLOYEE' and activity 'Declaration REJECTED by PRE_APPROVER'

Name: Average time it takes Declaration REJECTED by PRE_APPROVER to be followed by Declaration REJECTED by EMPLOYEE
Metric: The average of the duration between activity 'Declaration REJECTED by PRE_APPROVER' and activity 'Declaration REJECTED by EMPLOYEE'

Name: Total time spent in Declaration REJECTED by PRE_APPROVER across all rework loops involving PRE_APPROVER rejection
Metric: The sum of the duration between activity Declaration REJECTED by PRE_APPROVER and the end of the case

Name: Average cycle time of cases that include Declaration REJECTED by PRE_APPROVER compared to cases that bypass PRE_APPROVER entirely
Metric: The average of the duration between activity 'Declaration SUBMITTED by EMPLOYEE' and activity 'Declaration FINAL_APPROVED by SUPERVISOR'

Name: Average time from Declaration REJECTED by PRE_APPROVER to the next Declaration SUBMITTED by EMPLOYEE
Metric: The average of the duration between activity 'Declaration REJECTED by PRE_APPROVER' and activity 'Declaration SUBMITTED by EMPLOYEE'

Name: Total elapsed time from first submission to final approval for cases where Declaration REJECTED by PRE_APPROVER occurs at least once
Metric: The sum of the duration between activity 'Declaration SUBMITTED by EMPLOYEE' and activity 'Declaration FINAL_APPROVED by SUPERVISOR'

Name: Average waiting time before Declaration REJECTED by PRE_APPROVER is executed after Declaration SUBMITTED by EMPLOYEE
Metric: The average of the duration between activity 'Declaration SUBMITTED by EMPLOYEE' and activity 'Declaration REJECTED by PRE_APPROVER'

Name: Average time between consecutive occurrences of Declaration REJECTED by PRE_APPROVER in multi-rejection variants
Metric: The average of the duration between activity 'Declaration REJECTED by PRE_APPROVER' and activity 'Declaration REJECTED by PRE_APPROVER'

Name: Average time from Declaration REJECTED by PRE_APPROVER to Payment Handled in successful end-to-end variants
Metric: The average of the duration between activity 'Declaration REJECTED by PRE_APPROVER' and activity 'Payment Handled'

Name: Minimum time required to resolve a case after Declaration REJECTED by PRE_APPROVER, measured until Request Payment
Metric: The minimum of the duration between activity 'Declaration REJECTED by PRE_APPROVER' and activity 'Request Payment'

Name: Total time from Declaration REJECTED by PRE_APPROVER to Declaration APPROVED by PRE_APPROVER in rework paths
Metric: The sum of the duration between activity 'Declaration REJECTED by PRE_APPROVER' and activity 'Declaration APPROVED by PRE_APPROVER'

Name: Average time between Declaration REJECTED by PRE_APPROVER and the final Declaration FINAL_APPROVED by SUPERVISOR in completed cases
Metric: The average of the duration between activity 'Declaration REJECTED by PRE_APPROVER' and activity 'Declaration FINAL_APPROVED by SUPERVISOR'

Name: Cycle time impact attributable specifically to Declaration REJECTED by PRE_APPROVER, calculated as the difference between total case duration with and without this activity
Metric: The average of the duration between activity 'Declaration SUBMITTED by EMPLOYEE' and activity 'Declaration FINAL_APPROVED by SUPERVISOR'

Name: Average duration of the entire process segment starting at Declaration SUBMITTED by EMPLOYEE and ending at Declaration REJECTED by PRE_APPROVER, grouped by year (2017 vs 2018)
Metric: ERROR: computing metric {'begin': activity == 'Declaration SUBMITTED by EMPLOYEE'", 'end': "activity == 'Declaration REJECTED by PRE_APPROVER'", 'aggregation': 'average', 'group_by': 'time:timestamp'}"
